name: Default Password Reset Email Template
description: This is the password reset email template that is associated with the directory
subject: Reset your Password
htmlBody:
Forgot your password?



We've received a request to reset the password for this email address.

To reset your password please click on this link (link expires ${expirationWindow} hours):
Link

This link takes you to a secure page where you can change your password. If you don't want to reset your password, please ignore this message. Your password will not be reset.

----------------------
For general inquiries or to request support with your account, please email change-me@stormpath.com
textBody:
Forgot your password?

We've received a request to reset the password for this email address.

To reset your password please click on this link or cut and paste this URL into your browser (link expires in ${expirationWindow} hours):
${url}

This link takes you to a secure page where you can change your password.

If you don't want to reset your password, please ignore this message. Your password will not be reset.
---------------------
For general inquiries or to request support with your account, please email change-me@stormpath.com
